main event: Three green flares fading into purple were observed for 3 seconds on a heading of 275 degrees azimuth.
interesting points: The objects were reported as flares, not UFOs.
The sighting was from an aircraft at 9,200 feet altitude, 10째55'N, 75째04'W in the Atlantic.
The objects appeared to be 1/8" by 3" in size at arm's length.
The report was received by phone from Harrison Airways, relating for Ramey Airways, who received the report from AF 5114.
The sighting was followed up by a message.
sighted object: Three green flares fading into purple
